attributes.additional_details: PLEASE share your experiences if you are affected by this poorly managed facility ,residents of Essex and Dartford and especially businesses that must be badly affected by the loss of work hours due to traffic buildup
attributes.background: junction 1a  closed regularly ( barrier control )  tailbacks  back down Bob Dunn way and over the overpass up Stone road ,  blocking access to Crossways Business Park   . M25 backs up daily to Orpington , and forget trying to cross on a Friday afternoon , unless you have NO choice !

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about congestion at the Dartford crossing and on the M25, but the Dartford crossing is already in public ownership, so we're not sure what specific action you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
